      • Server

        public Server(int numberOfClients,
              Model model,
              int port)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of server.
        Parameters:
        numberOfClients - number of clients that will connect.
        model - is the model where the clients should be added to.
        port - which is the port number the serversocket will communicate on.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if you try to accses input from a player that has not connected.
